statements: DELETE FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 100 AND purchase_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM CustomerPurchaseHistory WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND purchase_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 100 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 100.50;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Purchases WHERE customer_id = 10 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity <= 5;
